input: John moved to the kitchen. Mary is in the garden. Where is John?
The ball is in the box. John picked up the ball. Where is the ball now?
Alice went to the park. Bob is at the library. Where is Alice?
The keys are on the table. Sarah moved the keys to the drawer. Where are the keys now?
Emma entered the living room. The book is on the shelf. Emma took the book to her room. Where is the book?
